item.title: VMC
item.description: Development version (the whole repository): git clone http://github.com/vmc-project/vmc.git To switch to pro tagged version 1.0: cd vmc git checkout v1-0 The list of new developments, bug fixes and the required versions of ROOT and Geant4 for each version can be found in the History file.

item.title: Geant3
item.description: Development version (the whole repository): git clone http://github.com/vmc-project/geant3.git To switch to the ‘pro’ tagged version 3.0: cd geant3 git checkout v3-0 To switch to the ‘old’ tagged version 2.7:cd geant3 git checkout v2-7 For older versions see the correspondent tag and the required version of ROOT in the history file.

item.title: Geant4 VMC
item.description: Development version (the whole repository): git clone http://github.com/vmc-project/geant4_vmc.git To switch to the ‘pro’ tagged version 5.1 (compatible with Geant4 10.6.x): git checkout v5-1 To switch to the ‘old’ tagged version 5.0 (compatible with Geant4 10.5.x): cd geant4_vmc git checkout v5-0 The list of new developments, bug fixes and the required versions of ROOT and Geant4 for each version can be found in the history file. Download Geant4 - from the Geant4 Web site
